comments.body: Referring to "the fix" in a comment isn't very useful past the lifetime of the pull request.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +109,113 @@          _ <- partyManagementClient.allocateParty(None, None)
          endAfterParty <- getLedgerEnd
          // without the fix, this call will cause the test to run into a timeout
          transactions <- txClient
            .getTransactions(begin, Some(end), M.transactionFilter)
